```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
source(here::here("src", "storm_runoff.R"))
```

```{r}
impervious_fraction <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)

runoff_volume  <- predict_runoff(Ia = impervious_fraction, A = 182)

```

```{r}
DF <- data.frame(impervious_fraction, runoff_volume) 
```

```{r}
plot <- ggplot(data = DF, aes(x= impervious_fraction, y =runoff_volume)) + geom_point() + geom_line() + labs(x= "Impervious fractions", y = "Runoff Volume")
```

```{r}
ggsave(here::here("figs", "Plots.png"))
```
